ECOSYSTEM.TITLE: Apla ecosystem
ECOSYSTEM.TEXT: Any Apla account owner can create customized blockchain ecosystem in one click. Apla ecosystem is software environment for running blockchain applications. Access to applications and right to participate in ecosystem management are owned by its members – Apla users invited by the ecosystem creator.

ACCESS.TITLE: Access control mechanism
ACCESS.TEXT: One of the main advantages of Apla over other blockchain platforms is that it has a multi-level access rights management mechanism in the ecosystem software environment.

DESCRIPTION.1: Access rights are set for all operations: creating and changing contracts, database tables, interfaces.
DESCRIPTION.2: Access rights can be provided to members of the ecosystem, to roles and to smart contracts.

SHOWREEL.TITLE: Apla for Government
SHOWREEL.SLOGAN: A private blockchain platform for e-Government
SHOWREEL.TEXT: Apla proposes to transition all governmental activities to a blockchain platform, rather than automating its separate services and/or functions

TEXT.1: It's not a means for digital modeling and automation of governmental activities within the existing legal framework.
TEXT.2: It's an instrument for creation of a conceptually new social and legal system, which will have most of its legally important interactions made automatically by smart contracts governed by smart laws within a single digital environment.

LIST.1: Registers of all departments are stored in one blockchain platform
LIST.2: Smart contracts ensure proper interaction of all registers
LIST.3: Legal system based on smart laws regulates the execution of smart contracts
LIST.4: Legal system facilitates holding of elections to representative power bodies and adoption of smart laws

DEPARTMENT.TITLE: A Separate Apla Ecosystem for Each Department

TEXT.1: A separate ecosystem should be created on the Apla platform for each department. Each ecosystem includes: registers, falsification-protected interfaces, smart contracts and smart laws that regulate the operation of smart contracts
TEXT.2: Departments can store their secret information in their own databases, and use data that is required for interaction with other departments and users in an eGaaS ecosystem.
TEXT.3: Interaction of departments with each other, and with individuals and legal entities is controlled by global smart laws of the governmental platform.

LIST.2: System for creation and assignment of job positions (roles)
LIST.4: System for notifying persons and roles about events
